Title: Video
Description: Platforms for sharing and streaming video content.

Platforms.Name: Title
Platforms.Description: The name of the video.

Platforms.Name: Description
Platforms.Description: A brief summary of the video content.

Platforms.Name: Author
Platforms.Description: The creator or uploader of the video.

Platforms.Name: Creation Date
Platforms.Description: The date the video was created or uploaded.

Platforms.Name: Duration
Platforms.Description: The length of the video.

Platforms.Name: Resolution
Platforms.Description: The quality of the video, e.g., 1080p, 4K.

Platforms.Name: Format
Platforms.Description: The file format of the video, e.g., MP4, AVI.

Platforms.Name: Tags
Platforms.Description: Keywords associated with the video content.

Platforms.Name: Categories
Platforms.Description: The genre or category of the video.

Platforms.Name: View Count
Platforms.Description: The number of times the video has been viewed.

Platforms.Name: Likes
Platforms.Description: The number of likes the video has received.

Platforms.Name: Dislikes
Platforms.Description: The number of dislikes the video has received.

Platforms.Name: Comments
Platforms.Description: Viewer comments on the video.

Title: Audio

Platforms.Name: Title
Platforms.Description: The name of the audio track.

Platforms.Name: Description
Platforms.Description: A brief summary of the audio content.

Platforms.Name: Author
Platforms.Description: The creator or uploader of the audio track.

Platforms.Name: Release Date
Platforms.Description: The date the audio track was released.

Platforms.Name: Duration
Platforms.Description: The length of the audio track.

Platforms.Name: Format
Platforms.Description: The file format of the audio track, e.g., MP3, WAV.

Platforms.Name: Album
Platforms.Description: The album the audio track is part of.

Platforms.Name: Genre
Platforms.Description: The genre of the audio track.

Platforms.Name: Tags
Platforms.Description: Keywords associated with the audio content.

Platforms.Name: Categories
Platforms.Description: The genre or category of the audio track.

Platforms.Name: Play Count
Platforms.Description: The number of times the audio track has been played.

Platforms.Name: Likes
Platforms.Description: The number of likes the audio track has received.

Platforms.Name: Comments
Platforms.Description: Listener comments on the audio track.
